You can now view the OIDC (OpenID Connect) provider and login timestamp for a user by accessing their details page on the `admin/users` page.

[Try it](/installation/security/supporting-multiple-oidc-providers.qmd)

<img width="100%" src="/releases/frontend/25.07/9b729390-1657-46eb-9218-3e1ef4ca610f.png" alt="A web interface displaying a dashboard for managing OIDC information and API credentials. The top navigation bar includes the ValidMind logo on the left and a user profile section on the right with a button labeled Manage Roles. Below, the page is divided into sections with OIDC Info and API Credentials headings. The OIDC Info section lists details such as OIDC Name, Last Login, and OIDC Config with corresponding data values. The API Credentials section shows API Key and API Secret with a button labeled Revoke & Regenerate on the right." />

<img width="100%" src="/releases/frontend/25.07/906870c5-bfa4-402c-b09b-0c2146fea7db.png" alt="A web interface for managing user details is displayed. The top section shows user information with labels for Created At and Terms Accepted, followed by a section titled Organizations & Roles containing a role labeled I am the Walrus and a blue button labeled Add to Organization. Below is a section titled OIDC Info with a message stating User has not logged in. The API Credentials section includes fields for API Key and API Secret with options to copy each, and a button labeled Revoke & Regenerate. The interface uses a clean layout with a white background and pink accents for buttons and labels." />
